synopsis.text:
Dolls with hearts and souls, crafted to transcribe the deepest emotions of individuals into words, are known as Auto Memories Dolls. In a world recovering from a devastating war that split the continent of Telesis, one such doll emerges with a unique past. Violet Evergarden, once a formidable weapon on the battlefield, now seeks solace in the art of letter-writing, hoping to uncover the meaning behind the words left to her by someone she held dear.

As Violet embarks on her journey as an Auto Memories Doll at the CH Postal Service, she encounters a myriad of emotions and forms of love through her clients. Driven by the desire to understand the significance of the words she heard during the war, Violet's new life takes her on a remarkable adventure. Along the way, she not only transforms the lives of those she writes for but also begins to grasp the complexities of human emotions and the power of words.

With her newfound understanding, Violet strives to make sense of her own feelings and the impact of her past. As she delves deeper into the world of Auto Memories Dolls, Violet Evergarden's story unfolds, revealing the beauty and heartache that lies within the connections between people.
